meanings.sent1: The leaves of the plant curled lamellately in the wind.
meanings.sent2: She sliced the bread lamellately, creating thin, even slices.
meanings.sent3: The cat danced lamellately across the room, amusing everyone.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight filtered lamellately through the blinds, creating a striped pattern on the floor.
meanings.sent5: The butterfly fluttered lamellately from flower to flower, a delicate dance in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The mushroom had a lamellately structured cap.
meanings.sent2: The lamellately wings of the airplane provided stability during the flight.
meanings.sent3: The lamellately design of the building's roof caught the eye of many passersby.
meanings.sent4: Her lamellately hair cascaded down her back like a waterfall of silk.
meanings.sent5: The lamellately pattern on the seashell resembled tiny staircases leading to the ocean.
